|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CNS2132;CAVIUM NETWORKS, Starâ„¢ STR8131, CNS2132-250FP128-AEFP-G, 218HL960.5b, E0921-G, TAIWAN; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM922 |cpu1_type_rev = ECONA |cpu1spd = 250<!-- 200 / 250 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->

|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = ProMOS;V58C251264SA15; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *[http://www.kiblerelectronics.com/corner/ccii_11.html ''Pictures and hacking details'' on '''KiblerElectronics'''] :00:40:D0 OUI, ''[[Mitac]]'' is presumed to be the manuf. :A date code of '''2809''' appears to be on the board. <!-- Manufacturer: HGST (Western Digital company) -->
